message: All metadata fields for the indicator 17-9-1, translated into en
data: Goal 17. Strengthen the means of implementing and revitalizing the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development17.9 Provide increased support at the international level to ensure the effective and targeted capacity building of developing countries and thus support national plans aimed at achieving all the sustainable development objectives, in particular within the framework of North-South cooperation. South and South-South and triangular cooperation17.9.1 Dollar value of financial and technical assistance pledged to developing countries (particularly in the framework of North-South and South-South cooperation and triangular cooperation)Not applicableN / A
